entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
